name: Vegetation Environment
description:
Vegetation Environment is a simple and small environment consisting of trees, grass and sand texturing. It serves as practise for me in Unreal Engine 5 as a means of environment design using the various tools available within the game engine. Available for MacOS. 

System Requirements

MacOS

  • M1 Pro or Better (Intel Macs also supported but may suffer with low performance)
  • 16GB RAM or Better

Development System Configuration

  • M1 Pro (10C CPU + 16C GPU)
  • 32GB RAM
